desc: Welcome to HARTS. Need shoes your toddler will leave on? We're stay on, sustainable, modern baby and toddler shoes. In HARTS, feet move naturally and best of all, you don't need socks. Born in Brooklyn. Free shipping in the US.

layout.text: A sock and a shoe had a baby bootee. Meet the 100% machine washable, stay on first walkers. No socks needed.
